Lucian's Charon: or, A survey of the follies of mankind Translated from the Greek. With notes, and a prefatory dialogue in vindication of translations. Lucian, of Samosata.
15, [3], 54 p.
printed for Loudon Farrow, and sold by the book-sellers of London and Westminster, London : [1700?]
Copy cataloged is misbound: p. 25 (D4r) follows p. 22 (D2v). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
